data.eml:eml: Prodasineura hoffmanni sp. nov. (Odonata, Platycnemididae, Disparoneurinae) from eastern Cambodia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kosterin, Oleg E. (2015): Prodasineura hoffmanni sp. nov. (Odonata, Platycnemididae, Disparoneurinae) from eastern Cambodia. Zootaxa 4027 (4): 565-577, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.4.6
